thread.title: Emmerdale reveals an exciting trailer for Robron's wedding | Metro News
thread.title_full: Emmerdale reveals an exciting trailer for Robron's wedding | Metro News

author: Duncan Lindsay For Metro.Co.Uk
title: Emmerdale reveals an exciting trailer for Robron's wedding | Metro News
text:
Duncan Lindsay for Metro.co.uk Wednesday 15 Feb 2017 4:28 pm 
(Start from 24 seconds) 
Emmerdale fans have been treated to their first look at the upcoming Robron wedding – and the trailer has got fans of Robert Sugden and Aaron Dingle more excited than ever before. 
The teaser showed footage from the episode which will screen on Monday 20th February and revealed an enthusiastic but nervous Robert trying to ensure the big surprise is as perfect as possible for his groom to be. 
With it being more difficult than anticipated to keep Aaron away from the Woolpack where Liv Flaherty (armed with a clipboard) is feverishly trying to get the place decorated. It’s all hands on deck for the Dingles – and Cain is giving the task of intervening as Adam and Paddy fail to keep Aaron from heading back to the pub before it’s time. Seriously guys, one job. (Picture: ITV) 
In a wonderful throwback to many key moments in the Robron story, Aaron finds himself locked in a boot while Robert and the team put the final pieces in place. 
As Robert opens the boot and invites his groom to marry him, what will happen next? 
You can find out by tuning in to ITV on Monday 20th February at 7pm. 
Check back on our soaps homepage on Sunday 19th February from 7am (we know, early rise on a Sunday!?) for brand new interviews, storyline gossip and maybe even a sneaky new picture or two. You can also follow our busy soaps Facebook page here.
